name: Kyriad Rouen Nord Mont St Aignan

reviews.text: This was a clean comfortable family hotel. This is the first time we have used this chain, and we would do so again. Adequate room for 2 adults and 2 children with a queen and 2 single beds. All french TV. Kettle, but the cups provided are very thin, small plastic, so would recommend buying some china ones from Carrefours across the carpark.
reviews.title: Ideal Road trip stopover with family

reviews.text: No fridge, but being winter, solved this problem by putting the milk on the windowsill!
reviews.title: Clean, good food lovely family room

reviews.text: No lift - and that could be wearing on the legs. Restaurant available for dinner, but opens at 7pm, which is normal French time, but a little late with a toddler.
reviews.title: Super hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We caught the bus to the city centre. About 30mins with stops - it goes past the University, so can get crowded. Easy to find stops in town and return.
reviews.title: Old style French rudeness.
Superb
reviews.text: Breakfast was minimal continental, but sufficient.
